short_effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user, Pikachu wearing a cap, powers up a jolt of electricity using its Z-Power and unleashes it. Critical hits land more easily.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user, Pikachu wearing a cap, powers up a jolt of electricity using its Z-Power and unleashes it. Critical hits land more easily.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user, Pikachu wearing a cap, powers up a jolt of electricity using its Z-Power and unleashes it. Critical hits land more easily.
